name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Steelbook Edition
summary:
Only at GAME Steelbook edition includes: 
- Exclusive Steelbook featuring Adam Jensen 
- Day One Edition game 
 
Secure the Day One Edition of Deus Ex: Mankind Divided to obtain all of the following items: 
- Covert Agent pack 
- Digital OST Sampler 
- Extra in-game mission 
- Digital books
